detail: business data analyst job category information technology time type full time minimum clearance required to start secret employee type regular percentage of travel required up to 10 type of travel local what youll get to do job description caci is seeking a hr business analyst for its program located at the naval yard in washington dc this position will analyze data and apply data visualization to tell a story that will be used to make important hr decisions if you are looking to be a part of a highlevel program management assistance to the navsea human resource office caci would like to speak with you more about the role  research analyze and present data on a regular basis to key stakeholders including senior level,gather and analyze data to tell a story through data visualization to identify patterns trends and correlations and offer ideas recommendations or solutions to better manage the business based on the data  analyze data and be able to articulate if data may be invalid incorrect or insufficient recommend and research ways to improve the data validity  manage and analyze workforce data to generate meaningful business insights  develop standard and ad hoc reports templates dashboards scorecards and metrics  troubleshoot data and reports  develop comprehensive presentations using data visuals  assist in various hr projects and continuous improvement initiatives  administrative tasks as needed you will be a part of a team which manages hr services for a workforce of approximately 7000 employees the position works independently with limited supervision and may coach and review work of other staff members location washington navy yard preferred  not required remote location possible youll bring these qualifications  an active secret clearance,bachelors degree in business finance computer science statistics mathematics hr or related field of study or equivalent work experience,3 plus years of relevant experience is preferred experience with datastatistical analysis is a must,hr knowledge or experience,strong data and analytical skills,experience with data visualization programs such as tableau power bi or other tools,strong relationship building skills with internalexternal partners and senior staff,must be detailoriented and exhibit creative problemsolving skills,highly proficient in excel powerpoint and other presentation software,strong writing skills,ability to work with multiple sources of data,excellent attention to detail,ability to work both independently and as part of a team,ability to succeed in environment with conflicting priorities,ability to think critically and develop innovative solutions,positive attitude and strong work ethic these qualifications would be nice to have  experience in dod environment military background a plus,2 years of experience as an data analyst  this position description is not an active opening but is representative of positions within caci that are consistently available individuals who apply may also be considered for other positions at caci what we can offer you  weve been named a best place to work by the washington post  our employees value the flexibility at caci that allows them to balance quality work and their personal lives  we offer competitive benefits and learning and development opportunities  we are missionoriented and ever vigilant in aligning our solutions with the nations highest priorities  for over 55 years the principles of cacis unique characterbased culture have been the driving force behind our success company overview at caci you will have the opportunity to make an immediate impact by providing information solutions and services in support of national security missions and government transformation for intelligence defense and federal civilian customers caci is an equal opportunity employer  femalesminoritiesprotected veteransindividuals with disabilities as a federal contractor caci is subject to any federal vaccine mandates or other customer vaccination requirements all new hires are required to report their vaccination status,
